original: intros P a b H. unfold Spoly_1 in H. inversion H as [HP | HP]. - unfold reds in HP. destruct HP as [P a b HSP | P a b c HIn HPc HR]. + apply reducestar_cb2 with (b::P). apply HSP. + apply reduce_cb2 with (b::P). apply HPc. - unfold reds in HP. destruct HP as [P a b HSP | P a b c HIn HPc HR]. + apply reduceplus_cb2 with (b::P). apply HSP. + apply reduce_cb2 with (b::P). apply HPc.
